snippet: The White House has a rare chance to propose and push through an agenda of tougher laws for public safety.
abstract: Editorial calls on Obama administration to seize opportunity presented by outrage over Newtown, Conn, shooting and pass meaningful gun control legislation.
lead_paragraph: The White House has a rare chance to propose and push through an agenda of tougher laws for public safety.

headline.print_headline: The Moment for Action on Guns
headline.seo: The Moment for Action on Gun Laws
headline.main: The Moment for Action on Guns
